Package application

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
application.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
The Controller class is the driver class that reads the input from GUI and interprets the data and implements the different classes to make the Payroll Processing program work. The class also has error handling that lets the user know if a selection is invalid.
Author:
Bhumit Patel, Soorya Srivatsa

    (package private) void addCommand​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This void method is called when the Add button is clicked on the GUI and appropriately adds the employee into the database.
    void addEmployees​(java.lang.String[] employeeInfo)
    This helper method is called to populate the employee database with data imported from a file on the User's machine
    (package private) void calculateCommand​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This void method is called when the Calculate Payment button is clicked and calculates the payment for all the employees in the database based on the hours, annual salary and employee type.
    (package private) void clearCommand​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This void method is called when the clear button is clicked and clears all the text fields, message area and toggled radio buttons
    (package private) void exportCommand​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This void method is called when the option button is clicked and opens the file browser for the user to choose a file to export the employee database into.
    private Profile extractProfile()
    This method is used to extract the employee profile information from the user inputs (From GUI).
    (package private) void fulltimeButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method disables the options that do not relate to full time employees, like Set Hours button, manager type, hourly rate and hours worked
    (package private) void importCommand​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This void method is called when the import button is clicked and opens the file browser for the user to choose a file to import the database from and calls the helper method to add the employees to the database
    (package private) void managementButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method disables the options that do not relate to management employees, like Set Hours button, hourly rate and hours worked
    (package private) void parttimeButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method disables the options that do not relate to part time time employees, like manager type and annual salary
    (package private) void printByDateCommand​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method displays all the employees in the database, ordered by the date they were hired
    (package private) void printByDeptCommand​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    This method displays all the employees in the database, ordered by the department they work in

    This void method is called when the Set Hours button is clicked and sets the hours for Part Time employees.

  • Method Details

    • fulltimeButton

      void fulltimeButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method disables the options that do not relate to full time employees, like Set Hours button, manager type, hourly rate and hours worked
      Parameters:
      event - This event represents the user clicking the fulltime radio button

    • parttimeButton

      void parttimeButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method disables the options that do not relate to part time time employees, like manager type and annual salary
      Parameters:
      event - This event represents the user clicking the Parttime radio button

    • managementButton

      void managementButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method disables the options that do not relate to management employees, like Set Hours button, hourly rate and hours worked
      Parameters:
      event - This event represents the user clicking the Parttime radio button

    • extractProfile

      private Profile extractProfile()
      This method is used to extract the employee profile information from the user inputs (From GUI). The method handles exceptions including invalid inputs and empty fields
      Returns:
      The method returns the profile of the employee

    • addCommand

      void addCommand​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This void method is called when the Add button is clicked on the GUI and appropriately adds the employee into the database. The method checks the validity of the user input in the fields (other than profile fields) and handles errors accordingly.
      Parameters:
      event - event This event represents the user clicking the Add radio button

    • removeCommand

      void removeCommand​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This void method is called when the remove button is clicked on in the GUI and appropriately removes the employee from the database if it is found. The method checks the validity of the user input in the fields (other than profile fields) and handles errors accordingly.
      Parameters:
      event - event This event represents the user clicking the Remove button

    • clearCommand

      void clearCommand​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This void method is called when the clear button is clicked and clears all the text fields, message area and toggled radio buttons
      Parameters:
      event - This event represents the user clicking the Clear button

    • setHoursCommand

      void setHoursCommand​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This void method is called when the Set Hours button is clicked and sets the hours for Part Time employees. The method checks if the employee type is part time and if not, displays the appropriate error message
      Parameters:
      event - This event represents the user clicking the Set Hours button

    • calculateCommand

      void calculateCommand​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This void method is called when the Calculate Payment button is clicked and calculates the payment for all the employees in the database based on the hours, annual salary and employee type.
      Parameters:
      event - This event represents the user clicking the Calculate Payment button

    • printCommand

      void printCommand​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method displays all the employees in the database
      Parameters:
      event - This event represents the user clicking the Print Database button in the Print Menu

    • printByDeptCommand

      void printByDeptCommand​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method displays all the employees in the database, ordered by the department they work in
      Parameters:
      event - This event represents the user clicking the Print by Department button in the Print Menu

    • printByDateCommand

      void printByDateCommand​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method displays all the employees in the database, ordered by the date they were hired
      Parameters:
      event - This event represents the user clicking the Print by Date button in the Print Menu

    • addEmployees

      public void addEmployees​(java.lang.String[] employeeInfo)
      This helper method is called to populate the employee database with data imported from a file on the User's machine
      Parameters:
      employeeInfo - A string array with an employee's information imported from a file

    • importCommand

      void importCommand​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      This void method is called when the import button is clicked and opens the file browser for the user to choose a file to import the database from and calls the helper method to add the employees to the database
      Parameters:
      event - This event represents the user clicking the Export button
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the file to import the database from is not found

    • exportCommand

      void exportCommand​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      This void method is called when the option button is clicked and opens the file browser for the user to choose a file to export the employee database into.
      Parameters:
      event - This event represents the user clicking the Export button
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the file to export the database to is not found
